weekly-20000002: Perform 1 roll on the resupply gacha.
weekly-20000003: Destroy 150 armored units in victorious battles.
weekly-20000004: Perform 8 Captures (Standard and Aided Captures both count).
weekly-20000005: Play 3 games of Luffberry Chess (does not include Simulation Mode).
weekly-20000007: Perform 4 Heavy Constructions (Doll and Fairy Heavy Constructions count toward this).
weekly-20000008: Occupy a total of 20 nodes in Gray Zone Exploration.
